1: %% Author: jens
    2: %% Created: 29 mar 2013
    3: -module(hty_percentencoding_SUITE).
    4: -compile(export_all).
    5: %%
    6: %% Include files
    7: %%
    8: 
    9: %%
   10: %% Exported Functions
   11: %%
   12: all() -> [
   13: 	decode_square_brackets,
   14: 	decode_latin1
   15: ].
   16: 
   17: decode_square_brackets(_Cfg) ->
   18: 	Input = <<"%5Blim/%5D">>,
   19: 	Facit = <<$[, "lim/", $]>>,
   20: 	Facit = hty_percentencoding:decode(Input).
   21: 
   22: decode_latin1(_Cfg) ->
   23: 	Input = <<"LIM%5Br%e4ksm%f6rg%e5s/%5DBOLLHAV">>,
   24: 	Facit = <<"LIM[räksmörgås/]BOLLHAV">>,
   25: 	Facit = hty_percentencoding:decode(Input).
